meta.name: description
meta.value: Tell the user what setting we changed, and to what.

parameter.name: setting
parameter.description: The setting that the user changed.

parameter.name: updatedValue
parameter.description: This is true if the user asked to turn on the setting, and false if the user asked to turn it off.

parameter.name: verbose
parameter.description: Whether the dialog should include additional detail or not.

parameter.name: deviceState
parameter.description: Contains details about the userâ€™s device.

parameter.name: partOfDay
parameter.description: User requested to change a setting until morning/afternoon/evening.

parameter.name: isTimeNextDay
parameter.description: Flag that indicates whether user specified time until which to change a setting is tomorrow and not today.

parameter.name: appName
parameter.description: The name of the app that posted the notification

parameter.name: isMessages
parameter.description: Flag indicating whether the Messages app is being targeted
